activities: Contact information consists of warranty card details for customers who purchase our goods, including name, mailing address and email address.  The warranty card is maintained so that we may keep in contact wit hte end user of our products.  It also serves as the basis for incentive programs for our independent distribution networks.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Denmark, France, Germany, Greece, Netherlands, Portugal, Spain, United Kingdom
recoursemech: We are committed to cooperating with the data protection authorities located in the European Union or their authorized representatives.
